Articles.Content:
The rules are simple.

Say something to go on the GIANT sandwich (doesn't have to be food!)

Say all the other ones above the new thing

Example:

Steve_The_Donut: Rocket fuel.

Derpman11234: Rocket fuel and potato eyes.

screaminginpanic: Rocket fuel, potato eyes, and a Sepratron.

I'll start!

 

An aircraft carrier.
something to go on the GIANT sandwich (doesn't have to be food!) & an aircraft carrier
something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas.
an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and an episode of Wings.
something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and an episode of Wings and a universal sandwich and a loaf and a can of diced tomatoes
something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and an episode of Wings and a universal sandwich and a loaf and a can of diced tomatoes and a kerbal

something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and an episode of Wings and a universal sandwich and a loaf and a can of diced tomatoes and a kerbal and one of my failed lightspeed rockets

something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and an episode of Wings and a universal sandwich and a loaf and a can of diced tomatoes and a kerbal and one of my failed lightspeed rockets and a meat lovers pizza

something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and an episode of Wings and a universal sandwich and a loaf and a can of diced tomatoes and a kerbal and one of my failed lightspeed rockets and a meat lovers pizza and a terrain scatter

something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and an episode of Wings and a universal sandwich and a loaf and a can of diced tomatoes and a kerbal and one of my failed lightspeed rockets and a meat lovers pizza and a terrain scatter and a small island

something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and an episode of Wings and a universal sandwich and a loaf and a can of diced tomatoes and a kerbal and one of my failed lightspeed rockets and a meat lovers pizza and a terrain scatter and a small island and the  island airfield

something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and an episode of Wings and a universal sandwich and a loaf and a can of diced tomatoes and a kerbal and one of my failed lightspeed rockets and a meat lovers pizza and a terrain scatter and a small island and the  island airfield anf the VAB

Something to go on a GIANT sandwich and an aircraft carrier and 5 bottles of welding gas and and episode of Wings and a universal sandwich and a loaf and a can of diced tomatoes and a kerbal and one of my failed lightspeed rockets and a meat lovers pizza and a terrain scatter and the Island Airfield and the VAB and an oblate planet
